search_results.title: Episode #13 - Hina Robinson and Tariq Jazeel - GeogPod
search_results.snippet: In this episode John had a very insightful conversation with Hina Robinson, a secondary geography teacher and Tariq Jazeel, Professor of Geography at UCL, ...

search_results.title: Geographical Association's Post
search_results.snippet: We're happy to announce that Hina Robinson has now officially taken over from Denise Freeman as GA President after serving as Vice President.

search_results.title: Presidential Lecture: Hina Robinson
search_results.snippet: Tell you the story of me becoming interested in geography where I talk about the importance of connected geographies.
